sellerCard.description:
With a decade of experience, I am Nikolin—an accomplished web developer and social media maestro dedicated to catapulting businesses into the spotlight.
Whether it's a stunning website or a dynamic social media strategy, I'm here to turn your digital dreams into reality.

description.content:
Are you in search of a dependable developer to bring your online presence to life?


I'm an experienced developer with a proven track record of creating modern, user-friendly websites that are tailored to your unique needs and objectives. With years of expertise under my belt, I'm dedicated to helping you achieve your business goals through an engaging online presence.


What You Can Expect:


  • Customized Excellence: I specialize in crafting websites that are not just functional, but also visually stunning. Your page will be a reflection of your brand, carefully customized to meet your specifications.
  • Collaborative Approach: I believe in working closely with you to create a tailored business profile that resonates with both you and your customers. Your input matters, and I'll ensure your vision is brought to life.
  •  Ongoing Support: A website is an ongoing project, and I'll be there to support you every step of the way. From regular updates to troubleshooting, I'll make sure your website is always running smoothly.


Let's get started today! Contact me to discuss your project and take the first step towards an outstanding online presence.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: Wordpress Installation + 1 Landing Page up to 6 sections + Form + Responsive Design

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: Modern 5 Pages Website design or redesign. Responsive Optimized - Easy to navigate

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: Modern 10 Pages Website with Optimised Responsive Design + Woo Commerce + Payment gateway

openGraph.title: develop a responsive wordpress website

reviews.comment: The website job involved a lot of details and interactive elements. The positive attitude and willingness to proceed; brought everything to a wonderful conclusion.
Niko, is an extremely diligent and hardworking developer, who went above and beyond to support me in completing my website, I would thoroughly recommend working with Niko in the future.

Nikolin did an EXCEPTIONAL job on my website! He was able to meet with me almost immediately and even took the time to give me a tutorial on how to customize elements for mobile. Working with him was a breeze—he went above and beyond, was very responsive, and unfailingly polite. Highly recommend! 👍

activeEducations.school: University of Modena and Reggio Emilia

consultationData.description: Get expert advice on WordPress setup, theme/plugin selection, customization, performance, SEO, security, and troubleshooting. Prepare your goals, questions, and site access. Personalized guidance.
